items.summary:
Ensure the backend recognizes these Internet Identity principals as Platform Admins by bootstrapping them into the admin allowlist during canister initialization and after upgrades (post-upgrade):
- b6cav-3sd7q-navb4-zf3yt-52cnf-gzonh-zab4f-rnkfa-fg42t-64thx-7qe
- 7sopg-rkdvi-vg7tv-4foks-ejhyr-rotwu-wcdxm-kkij6-zwzel-qownx-aae
Persist the platform-admin allowlist (AccessControl state) across canister upgrades so that admin access does not revert or get lost after redeployments/upgrades.

If implementing REQ-56 requires a state schema change (e.g., adding stable state for AccessControl), add a conditional Motoko migration (backend/migration.mo) that safely preserves existing app data and initializes any new stable fields without trapping.
